span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項來顯示資訊。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 第二個程式碼範例提供第一個程式碼範例使用的範例中介層商務物件。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項來顯示資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您可能是耗費 （依據時間或資源） 的 Web 網頁執行每一資料作業建立的商務物件使用。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 其中一種方式使用高度耗費資源的物件可能要一次，建立它的執行個體，並快取將在後續的作業，而不是建立及終結針對每個資料作業。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 這個範例會示範這個模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以處理事件，物件會先檢查快取，然後建立執行個體中，只有當其中一個未已快取。You can handle the event to check the cache first for an object, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然後，處理快取供日後使用，而不是終結該商務物件的事件。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此範例中，屬性類別設定為`true`，以直接不呼叫執行個體上。In this example, the property of the class is set to `true`, to direct the to not call on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例提供上述的程式碼範例會使用範例中介層商務物件。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 程式碼範例包含的基本商務物件，定義`EmployeeLogic`類別，這是一個類別，會維護狀態，並封裝商務邏輯。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that maintains state and encapsulates business logic. 如需完整的工作範例，您必須編譯為程式庫，此程式碼，然後再使用這些類別從 ASP 頁面。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]
